name: Matthew Johnston
text: To be totally honest, I feel like these guys should offer me a part time job with how often I recommend them. You simply cannot find a better golf shop to help you with any questions or needs you might have. I’ll never buy clubs anywhere else as long as I’m in the Birmingham area.

name: Charlie Thompson
text: Gaius is gone but his Son has stuck with the original game plan. Great golf shop with much local knowledge. Good gear, deals and people.

name: Tanner Moore
text:
Amazing Customer Service went in looking for a set of blades tried 2 or 3 from Titleist and Mizuno Ended  up with the Mizuno 921 tour .  It’s funny one of the guys was listening to me hit and he even said I should go with a stiff iron shaft  like the other guy said.

If you like too have that feeling of someone Caring about your golf game come here. They didn’t rush me or make you feel like another dollar coming in the door.  Support local!

name: Jared Neighbors
text: Absolutely blown away by the professionalism and customer service. Austin Hooks not only exceed my expectations, but he is extremely knowledgeable and his customer service is top notch. Inverness Outdoors has my service from here on out. Thank you again, you guys are awesome!

name: Michael Abrams
text: Best mom and pop non-life box golf shop. They'll discount just about anything

name: Ryan Watson
text: I visited Inverness Outdoors (Inside Inverness Golf) to have some work done one of my firearms. Austin was very knowledgeable and helpful! The service was exactly what i would expect out of a high quality store, and the prices were great as well! Highly recommended!

name: Amanda Dykes
text:
Everyone was so helpful and got me exactly what I needed. No one treated me differently because I was a woman (problems I find in this industry often). I was shopping for my son and their junior sets are better than any others I've looked at.
The prices were better than what I have found online.

name: Reno Jones
text: Great customer service!!! Love this place. Got fitted for new irons and Guice took his time with me and got me fitted perfect!!! Highly recommended

name: Blanche Pearson
text: Great staff. Very friendly and knowledgeable.  Very fair prices. Quick service on regrouping my clubs.

name: Skip Rockett
text: Just found Inverness Outdoors inside this business. Austin was very helpful. Has FFL. I recommend him.

name: Richard Bruce Hamilton
text: I purchased another set of Callaway's today. (4th) The team they have are knowledgable,  friendly and always jovial. I wouldn't consider shopping elsewhere.  Thank you Billy, your attention to detail and advice is appreciated.

name: Glen Calvert
text: Have gone in two separate times for iron fittings.  Great customer service and very patient when testing out all the different clubs.  Very good trade in values on my old clubs and good club work on re-gripping and re-shafting.

name: CRI Trains
text: Fantastic golf shop, always friendly when I stop by.  Excellent customer service and really good prices and selection.

name: TDTiger R
text: Great folks and a great place for all golf needs.  The ONLY place I'll buy clubs

name: John Brune
text: Supper helpful and nice. Guice is good at getting you into the correct club's.

name: Ryan Hamilton
text: Amazing service and prices. Highly recommend!

name: Todd Addison
text: Always Great service! the staff helps you with a sense of urgency and gets you what you want quickly.  👍👍👍👍

name: Jim Raines
text: Outstanding customer service and follow up with customers.Wife bought club and they couldn't find head cover.They followed up after the weekend called her and provided the head cover.

name: Shelton Morrow
text: Very friendly staff and they know there stuff

name: Scott Hawkins
text: Henry is great. Needed my irons bent upright and a new shaft put in and he took 10 minutes, pga store was going to take 24 hours and 100 dollars.

name: frank mickens
text: Great people there.they treat you like they appreciate your busines and give you a fair trade in value for your used clubs

name: Jordan Al
text: Great selection friendly service good repair service .

name: Neil Ramey
text: best little golf store in town

name: Case Bryant
text: Great

name: Wesley Sparks
text: Great staff

name: David Levins
text: Great folks and very knowledgeable.

name: Larry Noble
text: Austin was great!

name: Wayne Johnson
text: Great place great people

name: Donado Paez
text: Great service

name: Aki Shin
text:
(Translated by Google) As a professional clerk became a clerk, he asked me to measure the width of my first foot in my life to buy shoes and received a good service, which is rare in America.

(Original)
プロのおじさんは店員さんになって、靴を買おうと、人生初の足の幅を測ってもらい、アメリカで珍しい良いサービスを受けました。

name: C Sim
text: Peaceful course, and nice people. Wear a collared shirt, and you'll have a great time. Cart path needs a lot of work, but other than that 4/5

name: Justin Watford
text: I've played worse but for $40 I expected more. Extremely friendly and professional staff (I give them and the clubhouse 5 stars) The course needs a lot of work. Greens were in terrible shape and sand traps were basically clay pits with grass growing. There is hardly any signage throughout the course which can be a pain to navigate if you've never been. I heard nothing but good things about this course but once we got past the first hole it was in rough shape.

name: Dan G
text: Inexpensive and a decent course. Friendly staff and great wings.

name: George Yinger
text: Wow not what expected shame it has potential but needs lots of work.

name: Ivan San Inocencio
text: Best course in my opinion love it

name: Dave N
text:
Poorly maintained in desperate need of work on the grounds
The greens are quite bad and the tre boxes are dried out mud flats
The layout is decent but no care has been taken to bring the course up to par .

name: Peter
text: We had a great time here. The host made us feel welcome from the moment we walked in the door. He was a great ambassador for Xgolf  I will definitely stop back in when in the area.

name: Terence Johnson
text: This is a great place that everyone should take the opportunity to visit if you're in Huntsville. It's not too big to get lost in other customers. The staff (Rod) is very helpful, friendly, and does everything he can to help. It's one of the best golf simulation venues that I've visited.

name: Nathan Coffman
text: Decent for bar food, good selection of beer, and golf sims with 22 courses + Driving range for a fair price.

name: Hopeful Nerd Overlord
text: Amazing place. Samantha is a great bartender

name: Hope G
text: Its a little pricey but really was worth it. My husband and I had a great time and our waiter was extremely friendly. We will be going again and looking forward to taking a lesson there next week. I could be very wrong about it being pricey though. I don't golf so there prices may be very normal..

name: Stefanie Mcclure
text:
Such a great place to go when you want to practice your golf game! Especially when it’s raining!!
Lashawnda provides excellent service even when this place is completely busy!

name: Michael Henderson
text: Cool place. Rod was super nice and helpful. Would go back just to hang out with him.

name: D Boyd
text: Nice indoor practice area.

name: Dawn Fields
text: Having a great ladies day experience. Golf instruction was just what I needed. Relaxed environment. Great for experienced and novice golfers. So.much.fun!!

resp.text: We're thrilled you learned a lot and had a fun time doing it, Dawn! Thanks for coming out to see us -- we're looking forward to your next visit. -X Golf Management

name: Zac Peterson
text: Badass place. It was hard as hell doing it for the first time but super fun anyways. Cool staff

name: Robert Mims
text: Had a good time. Lots of fun once you get use to the short game .

name: John majane
text: Nathan is very knowledgeable and friendly!

name: Craig Dailey
text: It's fun, but not as realistic as you'd hope.  Also a bit expensive.

name: Michael Hesse
text: Still working out some bugs in the software, but fun place.

resp.text: Thanks for coming out, Michael! We're always working hard to improve the experience here, and we hope you notice that improvement next time. -X Golf Management

name: M B
text: Great place, had fun but they need food!

resp.text: Glad you enjoyed stopping by, Vic! We serve food, as well as beer and wine in our bar area. Hoping you'll be back soon. -X Golf Management

name: Haley Buie
text: Such a fun place for experienced and new golfers!

resp.text: Thanks, Haley! We appreciate the review. We'll see you next time. -X Golf Management

name: Josh Evans
text: Awesome place great prices

name: Louis Mitchell
text: Was impressed, clean, friendly and fun

resp.text: We're glad we exceeded expectations, Louis! Thanks for stopping by -- hope you make it back here soon. -X Golf Management

name: Chip Carter
text: Great fun

name: Mark Johnson
text: Great place to golf!!!

resp.text: Thank you for the support, Mark! We hope to see you again soon! -X Golf Management

name: Morris Lauderdale
text: Great

resp.text: We're happy that you enjoyed stopping by, Morris! We hope you'll be back our way again soon. -X Golf Management

name: Tim Aper
text: I got to play Pebble Beach!  They took time to explain and made sure I enjoyed the experience.  Great staff!  Thank you

name: Dennis Leones
text: Great course. Great employees. Almost great layout. Why "almost"? I don't think I could walk that course in my younger days.

name: tom pruitt
text: Staff is always accommodating. Flexible and first priority is customer service. Love the staff. Makes my bad round of golf easy to endure.

name: Jim Thompson
text: RTJ Oxmoor is a great golf course. Ridge and Valley are fun. The most fun is the Par 3. Great for your short game. Food at the golf shop is good. Service is very good.

name: Wyatt Westbrook
text: Beautiful course! Don't skimp out on a cart rental,  the hills are unforgiving.  Awesome staff and amazing times here at Oxmoor valley!

name: Marc Hernandez
text: Friendly and helpful staff at a fun course to play.

name: MaryAnn Blair (Elegant Lady Sewing)
text: Even during COVID-19, the staff were as great as always. They wore masks as did customers in the golf shop. Hand sanitizer was available at the desk. Selection was top notch as always on apparel,  clubs, and accessories. We love RTJ Trails.

name: Tom Jacques
text: Nice golf shop.

name: Mark Fox
text: Friendly staff. The Chef salad was large and delicious.

name: Jim Powell
text: Played here a couple of days after playing another RTJ Golf Trail course,  Ross Bridge. Ross Bridge is better in every way.

name: Charles Benson
text: Big Golf course lot of different  areas to play golf  good food.Wonderful people.

name: Curtis mitchell
text: If you want the best Oxmoor vally golf has it

name: Hailey
text: Been coming here for a year! Great course!

name: Ross U
text: Great public place to play golf. Best par three I've played. Nice staff.

name: Cory Windorff
text: Nice golf shop with wears and all you need to get through a round or two.

name: George Harris
text: Wet, yet beautiful and fun.

name: Korey Newsom
text: Great course, Great people...Really enjoyed myself.. Alabama's Best course so far!! #WoodNation

name: Tolly Walker
text: fairways and greens in great shape. greens actually have fringes.

name: This Is Me Can’t u see It’s a CZ
text: Very nice course Helpful Staff

name: Terence Young
text: Well organized golf tournament fund raiser for Kid One Transportation, Make A Wish and Crisis Center.

name: David Dinehart
text: Front counter staff could have more upbeat.

name: Gary Hosking
text: Greatly run facilities

name: James Banken
text: Large spacious shop, great selections.

name: Brad Botes
text: Challenging and well maintained public golf course. Friendly staff.

name: Iguatemy Guarana
text: Good selection and the staff is very friendly

name: Bruce Cox
text: Nice facility, play the ridge.

name: David Luke
text: Great place to play.

name: nathan poore
text: Awesome, awesome place.

name: ALBERT THOR HARSTVEDT
text: Awesome course!

name: Jerry Hanner Jr
text: Nice place

name: Jim Esdale
text: Overcharge for sloppy conditions

name: hunter conlee
text: Awesome

name: Raymond Dunn
text: Good

name: Jesse Hollingsworth
text: Very pretty course with great scenery. The greens here are some of the toughest greens I have ever experienced. If you are up for a challenge, this is a neat course to play.

name: Kim Melton
text: We had my niece's baby shower at Cumberland today and it was super nice. The place has amazing views and Veronica runs the place top notch!

name: r b
text: My first time there and I was impressed..Veronica is a very good manager...she is on top of the flow of players..

name: Brian Tolzman
text: Veronica was great!  The course was in rough shape. They did have bad weather however don't think that affected the conditions though.

resp.text: Not a correct assessment.  Condition and layout, one of the best in the area at this price point.

name: jullie hallman
text: Beautiful

name: Tangy Bodie
text: My husband and 3 others drive over 1 hr to play this course. When they got there a lady was working the club house. They informed her that they had reserved a tee time at 12:30. She was soooo nasty to them. She threw her hand up to cut them off and informed them that there were no carts available for 30-40 mins. The guys were ok with this since they would hit the driving range up in the meantime. It was her holier than thou attitude that made them mad. The owner was contacted and he defended her saying she sometimes comes off as rude, he did however go speak to the men and offered them a Gatorade as compensation... Yes will deff not be back! But they did say the course was nice.

resp.text: The real story of this review is that Tangy Bodie whatever her name may be, wasn't even at the golf course.   This is more of a story of how she can attempt to extract extreme compensation for the threat of a bad review.  From the moment speaking with Alexis on the phone the conversation quickly became "what kind of compensation will you give me??"  Meaning she wanted me to refund over $ 160.00 in greens fees because of her threats of a poor review.   I went out to the course and spoke to the gentlemen about the incident.  They were delayed only 5 minutes from their tee time.  My worker could have had a cooler head dealing with customers, but an apology was made and the men appeared to be happy that I looked into the situation. I offered to buy them a round of beers as a friendly gesture.   I am more than willing to accept a one star review than cower to a person trying to extort money in lieu of a bad review.   Cumberland Lake GC is one of the finest golf courses in Birmingham at its price point.  And, we also have some very fine individuals working behind the counter.  Please judge for yourself.

name: Mike Hamner
text: Really nice course, fairways and greens were very playable, challenging layout. Will definitely want to play it again.

name: Michael Dennis
text: Love it such a nice place to hang out and supper friendly  staff!!!

name: Jackie Aronhalt
text: My husband golfed 2 rounds here and loved it! I enjoyed the huge (amazingly clean) pool, food, drinks and view. Awesome!

name: Daniel Banks
text: Great little course. Played it while in Birmingham on business. Greens were a little slow, but rolled smooth. Fantastic layout. Will play again next time in town.

name: Jane Aronhalt
text: New ownership has made amazing turn around. Beautiful course. Love the views. Looking forward to booking a group event.

name: David SMith
text: Course is looking really good! They seem to be making a lot of improvements. Best deal in town at $23 on Tuesdays!

name: Brandon Shirah
text: Love the layout. Course was bought by a group of people and since then they have let the course go a little bit. New new groundskeeper to take pride in the course.

name: Homer Marlowe
text: By far in the best shape it has ever been in thanks to a  new grounds keeper  sent from heaven an new managers that are looking out for the members a great place to jone

name: Parker Cantrell
text: 19th hole has some of the sweetest people around. Worth the trip

name: Lavador Sizemore
text: Beautiful golf course, i worked at this golf course back in 1996 and 97 alot of good memories!

name: Terry Crane
text: Greens are fast. Course in good shape

name: Byron Dixon
text: Very friendly staff. Great rates.

name: Harrison Jones
text: Nice place.

name: L PHILLEY
text: Awesome stuff and awesome customer service! They are always nice and welcoming. I’ve been pleased with all my visits. It’s an awesome place!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5 star review! We look forward to seeing you next time you stop in and see us!

name: Amos Jackson
text: Stopped by while my wife was at appointment, my son and I was looking for him some Jr. PGA equipment to add to his bag. We were greeted with a smile and a eagerness to help.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars Amos! Hope you see you and your family again very soon!!

name: antwone johnson
text: Mr Danny was AMAZING! Super helpful, very charismatic, knew his stuff and guided me in the right direction with everything! He deserves a raise!!!

resp.text: Thanks so much for the 5 stars Antwone! We really appreciate the kind words regarding Danny and hope that we see you again very soon!

name: Jack Poundstone
text: For the first time, I had a great experience at the PGA Superstore. Danny was incredibly helpful and extremely knowledge about Driver shafts. I could not recommend him more. I never felt rushed or pressured to make a purchase. Go over and ask for Danny or Brooks - both are great.

name: Arlin McCauley
text: Danny at the Birmingham, AL store went above and beyond helping me find the right set of irons. He spent more than ample time switching out irons heads and shafts, giving me many different options. Him being a left handed golfer, like myself, he showed genuine interest in helping me improve my game. He deserves recognition.

name: kelly harcrow
text: Danny L. Was very helpful fitting my son with a new set of irons.

resp.text: Thanks for the 5 stars Kelly! Hope to see you and your son again very soon!

name: Ryland Spitzer
text: This was my first time shopping at this location. I went in with the intention of buying a new set of irons. They were sold out of the irons I had been looking at online so I went to the simulators were two workers were talking and seemed bothered that I walked up and needed assistance. Before I even asked a question I was asked “is your name on the list?” (There were no names on the list) I told him I wasn’t here to get fitted I just wanted to know if they had a demo I could hit a few times. He put together a club and then said we don’t have any available bays. I waited and then another gentleman came up and asked a question about club fitting and the employee that was helping me took him directly to a bay and never once said a word to me. I waited 10 more minutes and I saw bays starting to open however I couldn’t get any help. I set the club down and proceeded to walk out of the store and go directly to Edwin Watts. The employee at Edwin Watts was great and let me hit multiple different clubs and I actually ended up buying a completely different set than what I had intended. ($1200 that Pga Superstore won’t get) My overall advice is to save the trip to Pga Superstore and head to Edwin Watts where you will be treated like you aren’t an inconvenience to the employees.

resp.text:
Hi Ryland,

I would like to apologize for the experience you received while visiting our store. I appreciate you taking time out of your day to make us aware of this situation. I would like to speak with you and see how we can make this right. Please give me a call whenever you get a chance at 205-440-4200 or send me an email at jstephens1@pgatss.com. Joe Stephens- Assistant General Manager

name: michael hooks
text: Shop here  twice a month. Went in last week looking for a new Driver 3 wood and hybrid. There were 2 salesman in one of the bays who saw me pulling clubs and looking at there way for some help. They were having some obvious private  conversation. Never once asked me if I needed help. Stood there for over 20 minutes with no acknowledgement  that I was there. I walked out.

resp.text: Hi Michael, I would like to apologize for your experience. This is not the way we do business and not the experience we want our customers to have. If you would like to come back into the store, I would love to help you myself and make up for the experience you received. My name is Joe Stephens, give me a call at 205-440-4200 or email Jstephens1@pgatss.com

name: Trey Covington
text: This place is horrible impossible to get help I did an in store pick up never got a notification that the order was ready went to the location had to find some help they acted like they’ve never done this type of online in store pick up before I don’t know if they need more training or what. The next day I received an email saying the order was ready what a joke. Hire some better people with better service at this location just horrible. I’ll spend my money online and get better prices anyway

resp.text:
Trey- I apologize for your poor experience. I would like to speak with you further to understand  exactly what happened. Please give me a call at your earliest convenience.

Jerry Ingram General Manager 205-440-4200

name: Nick M
text:
Made the 4 hour trip to get fitted for clubs. As a new golfer, only been playing for 2 months, I figured I could count on PGA Superstore to be able to assist like I needed them to. I wanted to get fitted for a complete bag of clubs. I swung 2 7 irons a total of 15 times and he started picking out clubs for me. I ended up making the mistake of buying clubs yesterday instead of trusting my gut and going somewhere else to be truly fitted to clubs, as I should be. I learned more about why he is a great golfer than why the clubs he was choosing were good for me.

So, in closing, I plan on going somewhere else for the rest of my golf needs.

EDIT: Jerry got me to come back in and get fitted with Drew, fortunately this time it was a better fitting. He spent time and explained things to me unlike the experience before. We did find a few things that we could have changed but they were all minor and could be fixed with more practice.

resp.text: Nick- I am sorry to hear of this poor experience. I would like to speak with you and see how we can make this right. Please give me a call at your earliest convenience at  205-440-4200 or send me an email at jingram@pgatss.com. Jerry Ingram- General Manager

name: Janice Holiday
text: I had the best experience thank you for all the help.

name: Gary Nolan
text: Great place. Great selection and great service!

name: Justin Fountain
text: Allways love the staff here. Best selection in Birmingham. Love the deals on demo clubs.

name: David Anderson
text: Love it ! Best selection of Volvik golf balls .

name: Brian Canady
text: Great items and helpful people.

name: Hailey
text: So I like going here but the service is always questionable. They seem to only greet the men everytime I've gone in there. Guess that's all they cater too.

resp.text: Thanks Hailey! We appreciate the kind words very much.

name: Joni Outlaw
text: Went in to buy a new M6 driver.  Picked it up and it started beeping.  Attendant came and took it, walked away and NEVER asked if he could help or if we were interested in purchasing.  We've decided since you could care less about our business, we will purchase it somewhere else.  We will NOT recommend you to anyone else.

resp.text:
Joni- I apologize for the poor experience you had in my store. I'd like to speak with you about it if you wouldn't mind. I can be reached at 205-440-4200 or jingram@pgatss.com.
Thank you
Jerry Ingram
General Manager

name: Wiliam hays
text:
Had to return shoes purchased in Atlanta.   After reading reviews of this store was not looking forward to it.
SURPRISE,  I was greeted by the young man behind the counter, who took care of my return, without delay or silly questions.  Had a friendly discussion with him.
Looked a golf bags, really helpful sales person, who seemed to know his merchandise.
Went to the shoe section, sales person  Danny L  ask if he could be of help.  Told him what I was looking for, he showed me many pair that worked.  Ended up buying two pair.
Really impressed with the three sales people, ask to speak to the new manager, Jerry Ingram.
He assured me,  what I experienced will be the normal at this store, if I should experience anything less let him know.

name: Joe Johnston
text:
I have never been miserable in a golf store, until now.

The staff reminds me of private club where it is acceptable to wear jorts, wife beaters and smell like they haven't showered in days.

Went in to buy a new set of irons and possibly a driver, could not get a sales person to assist, when I did explained my game and wanted guidance I was greeted with a slack jawed look followed up with, 'these are on sale'.

Best thing for the golf community in BHM would be for this store to go out of business.

name: thebrogdonboy
text: Every time I go they have a massive selection and never what I like. They only keep in stock weird degrees and shaft selections and it is never what they let you demo. Please support a local golf store over this non caring set of employees.

resp.text:
Sir, I’m sorry for our store not having the selection you were looking for. If you would like to schedule a time to shop and work with me individually I would be happy to accommodate you and find the selection you are needing to enhance your game.
Thanks
Jerry Ingram
General Manager
205-440-4200

name: Allie Ingram
text: Great customer service and everything you could possibly need!

name: Jerry Latham
text: Big selections and great staff.

name: Bryan
text:
I was hesitant to visit this store due to the poor reviews online about rude employees and bad customer service, but I visited today with my son who is learning to play golf.  Cory, the manager, was very friendly and helped my son find the right driver, and even gave him some helpful tips. He then took time to show him how to use the computer swing cameras in the hitting bays so he could watch himself and learn what to practice.
He also helped me test a few new grips for my putter and was extremely helpful and friendly. We will definitely visit the store again.

name: Danny Avant
text: Please extend my sincerest appreciation to your sales associate Trey for his assistance and patience yesterday during my and my friends first visit to your store. Without a doubt, he is the most outstanding sales representative I've encountered any where. You've got a real gem in him and I hope you reward him appropriately. Because of him you now have two dedicated customers.

resp.text: Thanks for your awesome feedback!

name: Eric Hutchens
text: This store has great associates and management.

resp.text: Eric- Thank you so much for the kind words. We appreciate you taking the time to compliment our team.

name: Scott Peace
text: My first visit to the PGA store today as I was looking to purchase a new set of clubs for my son. The store is impressive however I was there for 20 minutes and not a single employee asked or offered any assistance. I went to the front and let the gentleman at the front know I was interested in getting a set of Jr Golf clubs and he pointed to a sign at the back of the store that said Juniors. Not sure what I was expecting. I went to the junior department and looked around for 10 minutes before leaving.

resp.text: Hi, we are updating all of our reviews and I wanted to make sure you heard back on this. I am so sorry to hear about your experience and that is not what we pride ourselves on. Please email social@pgatss.com with your contact information. Thanks!

name: Ethan Sullens
text: What's it to love? It's a store. It's a superstore at that! They have a sign that says they provide world class customer service. Clean business. Nice people. It's what's up my friends.

name: Brad 024
text: Their service has improved tremendously and they have great options for all golf gear. Looking forward to continuing shopping with them!

name: Trey Sansing
text: Absolutely horribly service! My friend and i were looking to buy a new set of irons and first off we had to practically beg to be assisted then he gave an attitude when both of us wanted to try clubs but was perfectly fine letting his grandson play on the simulator. I wish this place wasn’t associated with Golf because it will ruin anyone’s preception of golf. Don’t go to this establishment

name: Will Byars
text: Go to Golf Galaxy if you’re in Hoover.

resp.text: HI Will- I'm sorry you had a poor experience. I'd love to speak with you and find out what happened to cause you to feel this way. Please reach out to me at your convenience. Jerry Ingram, General Manager,  205-440-4200 jingram@pgatss.com

name: Todd Workman
text: Great experience, went beyond try to sell you something to really helping with your game, ask for Greg! The staff is extremely knowledgable. I highly recommend dropping buy and looking at this new facility and the inventory is unbelievable.

resp.text: Thanks for your awesome feedback!

name: Payton Ahlemeyer
text: Best value in Birmingham. Friendly staff.

name: Richard Hillenbrand
text: 2nd time to store trying to buy a driver. Unless you are buying a 600.00 driver they are not interested in helping you. Asked for help to fit me for new driver. I hit 3 balls and he was ready for me to leave. Didn't want to help and didn't act like he wanted to be there. After reading other reviews I should have known better than come back a second time. Will never go back!

name: Greg Mcbride
text: Great experience, great help, the manager Jerry Ingram was a very helpful and polite

name: David G. Song
text: Value Price for indoor practice bay, great deals from the store time to time, kind and knowledgable staff helping well from most of in-store experiences.

name: Bamabeachboy2
text:
So in the span of three weeks I drop over $1,000 in the 280 store.....completely upgraded every club in my bag "m2 irons" including a new $150 bag. I purchaced two fairway woods, a putter and a new Bag during my last visit. The cashier charged me twice for the woods....when i questioned it he acted like a jerk and started talking under his breath. I showed him on the receipt because he said "no i didn't". He was to busy chatting with another employee behind the counter to do his job. No big deal the guy just sucks at customer service right. So today I walk in the door at 20 minutes til 6pm. They close at 6pm. I was asked as i walked in the door if I knew what I wanted because they were about to close. Told him i was going to get a new driver needed to get a 10.5 degree. He asked again did i know which one I wanted because they are closing. With a smile i just said no problem I'll go somewhere else.
I will never spend another dime in this store.

Tomorrow I'll drive over to Inverness Golf and pick out my $500 driver for my post father's day gift.
Inverness Golf for me from now on.....don't waste your time or money on these rude idiots. Worst customer service I've ever!

name: Nancy Miller
text:
Wonderful customer service!!  I started a new job, recently. My “dream” job. As I learned my way around the office and got to know my co-workers, I discovered that golf is the unofficial job requirement there, lol. Having never played, I was panicked a little about pursuing this new hobby. I wandered in to the PGA Tour Superstore in Inverness.

As I browsed the store looking at the enormous selection of every kind of equipment I became so overwhelmed. Thankfully a salesperson, Drew, found me. Bless him, he was so patient as I described my predicament. He helped me find the right clubs, bag, shoes, towel, and all the other things a new golfer needs.  He was also patient with my need for things to “match” lol. Golf is an expensive pastime, but Drew made me confident in my decisions. He shared a lot of information about the local golf scene too.

I will definitively be back, and ask for Drew! It’s rare to find this kind of personal attention!  And if my co-workers can’t teach me to play well enough, I’ll be back for lessons!!

name: Dustin Holder
text: Reviews are accurate. Complete ***holes. First thing the guy at the simulator asks when I ask to hit a driver in the range is if I’m in the market with a smirk...

name: JJ Hadder
text: I realize that 7:57 PM is basically 8:00, but why even ask what is it that I needed if your reply was going to be, “we open back up at 10:00 in the morning.” Literally just needed 2 scotty Cameron grips that were right beside the register. C’mon man.

name: Scott Hawkins
text: They do not want to help unless you are buying all brand new clubs. Did not want to help with getting fitted for my irons bc I was not buying new. Said that it would be 24 hours before I could get my clubs back... so I went to Inverness golf and it took 10 minutes. Do yourself a favor and go to Inverness golf on 280.

name: Kevin Hopkins Jr.
text: Amazing store even better customer service!

name: shaggy white
text: Customer service needs to improve. The selections are great though.

name: Frances Stewart
text: Great selection of womens golf gear!

name: Steve Hall
text: A bit pricey!

name: JC Lett
text: What I've come to expect from pga superstores , zero customer service and a bunch of A**holes working there and this location is no different . In fact I made the comment to one of the employees "I don't know how you all stay I'm business" and his reply was with a shrug "then go somewhere else" . There is obviously no service training or much of a screening process in hiring , in Birmingham there is nothing better is only problem , Inverness golf is just as bad

name: Colton Marucci
text: Multiple times misled and given misinformation. Will not go back.

name: Blake Jefferson
text: Every time I go there no one is in there. Probably because their customer service is so terrible. They always make sure to let you know if they are “close” to closing.  If it wasn’t for the younger guy with the glassss I wouldn’t go back.

name: Wayne Zeigler
text: Best chicken sandwich ever.

name: david isbell
text: Employees here ignore you.

name: Sharon Hodgens
text: This place is a bad example for the PGA !

name: Anthony Marino
text: GREAT  Place !

name: Bryant Mauldin
text:
I came down to get my wedges fit with Jon.
It was truly a great experience. He was very friendly and accommodating. The results immediately affected my game for the better. I look forward to coming down again and fitting the rest of my set.
Club Champion definitely helped me. I highly recommend getting your set fitted if you would like to improve your game.

resp.text: Thanks, Bryant!

name: michael hooks
text: Tried to make an appointment over a month ago. No times were available for the days I needed so I signed up on a waiting list to be called 2 weeks later no word. I got an email advertisement from Club Champion  so I responded to that with my situation and quickly got a call back. I made an appointment but had to cancel due to illness . Not only did I call an ask for another appointment I filled out the appointment reminder I was sent on my phone for the first appointment and was told I would be contacted immediately to reschedule. Been two weeks with zero communication. I don't get it. I am trying to spend money with you guys but this is very frustrating.

name: Jason Zylstra
text: First time getting fitted and it was a great experience. Definitely recommend

resp.text: Thank you, Jason!

name: larry west
text:
prescription without diagnosis is malpractice!

I commited a crime against myself by spending BIG money trying to fit myself with my checkbook. I bought high end  shafts for my driver and 3 wood last season WITHOUT getting professional help.

I recently was professionally fit by Jon at the Birmingham location and to put it simply.......I now.have the correct shafts in my equipment and another 20 plus yards from both.!

I cannot thank Jon enough for helping me get the right fit for me and greatly improving my game and enjoyment.

I will say I was willing to also buy new irons and wedges and JON determined my current gamers are perfect. What i loved about the experience was at no time did I ever feel pressured to buy more clubs.. just the opposite happened..Jon gave e confidence that what i have was perfect even when I said ..Are you sure ..Im ok if you believe I need something else...

resp.text: Thanks, Larry!

name: John David
text: Great place.

resp.text: Thanks, John!

name: Juan Cepero
text: Great Local golf shop here in Dothan. I recently purchased a used left handed Cobra F8 driver and I love it. I'm new to golf so a driver was the last thing I was missing. The whole staff was very helpful and attentive. Really great group of folks.

name: Eric King
text: Staff is very helpful. Much better store than you would expect to have in Dothan.

name: Jerome Vascocu
text: These folks have a surprisingly great inventory and are the most helpful and attentive I’ve ever come across. The best “local” golf store atmosphere out there. Never been disappointed!

name: Timra Cloud
text: Quick, helpful and knowledgeable staff.  So glad they're locally available.

name: Norman Clark
text: Fantastic store proving good quality products, fittings and repairs.  Extremely knowledgeable staff on all things golf!!

name: Dp01
text: Best golf shop in town.  Been coming here for years and I’ve never had a bad experience.  If you need new clubs, gear or need work done on existing clubs, this is the only place you should go.  Everyone is always friendly.  Great selection and sales are good too.  Support local golf shops!

name: Umar Abdul-Hakeem
text:
I stopped in GolfPlus Dothan yesterday after visiting the store on Thursday. I had the best experience in 20 plus years of playing golf and having a few fittings in the past.

The young man Mark Krystyn was a superstar, when it comes to professionalism and product knowledge. He gave me an iron fitting and had me walking out of the store very satisfied. The only problem I had with the entire session was that it had to end.

Living in Florida was the only reason that I did not pull the trigger on the purchase, and Mark never pressured me to purchase, what he did say is because you live in Jacksonville Fl area (4 hours away) if I am not satisfied with wanting to purchase the irons in Jacksonville he can order the irons and have them delivered to me.

I told him, my issue is if I need something done To the clubs the distance is to far from my residence.

Top notch Fitter and Organization. KUDOS to Mr. Watson for having Mark on the team.

Umar Abdul-Hakeem

name: Jamie Gilmore
text: I purchased my set of Cleveland irons from here a few years back and couldn’t be happier with them. Also recently  got my putter regripped there. Best shop in the wiregrass in my opinion, don’t waste your time anywhere else. Everyone there is super nice, extremely knowledgeable, and no pressure environment. Everything you are looking for in a positive golf shop experience. Huge variety on golf gear and accessories and good trade in values.

name: Dave King
text: Excellent service from the most knowledgeable staff in the area, I go nowhere else for golf gear. Highly recommended

name: Green Beret1998
text: I stopped in today to purchase a few golf grips and a new 3 Wood Headcover. The store looks amazing and the staff was super friendly and answered all my questions! Super Awesome golf shop!! Mark was so helpful! A+++

name: Jerry Clark
text: Great service from Alan and his staff every time I visit. Always honest and no pressure on buying something not needed. Service on repairs and customization is the best in the area.

name: Rodney Reynolds
text: Professional, polite, knowledgeable and courteous.  Always make the customer feel welcomed.  They did an awesome getting a club repaired for me when I first started out golfing.  I always visit the shop when I come home.

resp.text:
Rodney,
Thank you for taking the time to rate us! We appreciate you stopping in and look forward to seeing you any time you’re in town.

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Keith Baker
text: Absolutely everything you hope for in a Golf Shop.  SUPERIOR SERVICE, TOP OF THE LINE EQUIPMENT, MODERN TECHNOLOGY,  FRIENDLY, COURTEOUS,  KNOWLEDGEABLE STAFF,  and GREAT PRICING!!  Alan and his team have earned my business for life,  well exceeding my expectations.  suggest you make the drive to allow them to do the same for you & your golf game as well!

resp.text:
Keith,

Thank you for taking the time to rate us! We’re glad you had a great experience with us and are proud to have earned your business. We hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Luke Douglas
text: Good selection. Nice staff. Quick service on club maintenance. A bit pricey.

resp.text:
Luke,

Thank you for taking the time to rate us. We strive to have the best staff, who focus on factory quality work. We hope to see you again soon.

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Josh Monforton
text: It is great there, they treat you like your family and give you wise information and have very nice used clubs and new clubs for good prices

name: b Lang
text: Very friendly. Fast re-grip of my clubs at good price. Nice shop.

resp.text:
B,

Thank you for taking the time to rate us! Our staff does the best to make sure every re-grip is done quickly and with factory quality to get you back on the course! We hope to see you again soon.

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Debra Flythe
text: Great place to get your golf gear.nice friendly people.

resp.text:
Debra,

Thank you for taking the time to rate us! We're glad you had a great experience with us and we hope to see you again very soon!

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Alexander Bonilla
text:
Showed up right before the holidays looking for a new set of clubs.  Allen took my wife and I in and we had an amazing experience.  We decided on a set of Pings, and within 45 minutes we walked out of the store with an order to Ping with a set of custom fitted clubs.  After doing my research as far as prices, we walked out with a deal I could not refuse.  Super friendly, knowledgeable staff.  Thanks Allen for such an easy, relaxed, and pleasant experience.

Alex

name: Cliff
text: Great place to purchase golf merchandise great service and friendly people.

resp.text:
Cliff,

Thank you so much for taking the time to rate us! We hope to see you again soon!

Sincerely,

Golf+

name: Chris Harvey
text: Very reasonable and fast service!

name: Michael Crews
text: The staff is very helpful and the prices are very reasonable.

resp.text:

text: Fantastic customer service. Unparalleled product knowledge.

text: Great service
